thread.section_title: Palm Gallery Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: very nice hotel with wonderful service
thread.title_full: very nice hotel with wonderful service - Review of Palm Gallery Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: zicann
title: very nice hotel with wonderful service
text:
We stayed at the palm gallery hotel for 3 nights and really enjoyed it. The staff is so nice they helped us with everything. We have been welcomed with a drink at the nice terrace and received several informaiton regarding dinner spots, sight seeing etc.
so if you plan to visit rome, go and stay at palm gallery hotel for a quiet and relaxing stay in between the big city rush :)
